title: Mini Cooper maker’s new ebikes are merging high tech and retro cool
content:
I always thought Mini Coopers were pretty cool, so I was pleased this week to learn that the Cooper Car Company, the original designer of the Mini Cooper, rolled out not one, but four electric bikes. They sit under the dedicated two-wheel division, Cooper Bikes.  The Cooper Bikes Company was founded in 2009 aiming to build innovative bikes for the urban environment. And they look a treat! Cooper has rolled out four bikes based on a central configuration.
